gruppe.irc

Class MessageEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • gruppe.irc.MessageEvent

  • public class MessageEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to pass information about a message between the IRCConnection class and its listeners. Objects of this class contains information about the message and also whether or not the message has been consumed by any of the listeners it has been passed trough.
    Author:
    Anders, Christian and Olaf.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageEvent

        public MessageEvent(java.lang.String prefix,
            java.lang.String command,
            java.lang.String message,
            java.lang.Object source)
        Constructor for creating new MessageEvent objects.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix given for this command
        command - the actual command (what is this message trying to achieve)
        message - the message attached to this command
        source - a reference to the IRCConnection object sending this messageEvent

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        public void consume()
        Method called to let this MessageEvent object consume the event. Consuming and event prevents it from being passed to the others listeners in que, ie. the event has performed its function and there are no need to keep passing it around.

      • isConsumed

        public boolean isConsumed()
        Method to check wheter this event has been consumed or not.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the event has been consumed, false otherwise

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Method returns the prefix of the command for this event
        Returns:
        the prefix of the command for this event

      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String getCommand()
        Method returns the command generating this event
        Returns:
        the command that generated this event

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Method returns the string attached to the command generating this event
        Returns:
        the string attached to the command generating this event

      • getSource

        public java.lang.Object getSource()
        Method returns the source object for this event
        Returns:
        the object which generated this event

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method returns a simplified string representation of this event
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A simplified string representing this event
